track.name: Not While I'm Around
comments: nopamuk and poorpedita said it all haha *-* it's so good like if he'd sing it to you, simply THAT great.

@nopamuk That's an interesting way to view it (no, really - not sarcasm). I come at this song with the view that it's slightly creepy just because of its context within Sweeney Todd. It's refreshing to try and listen to it while separating it from its context.
This is what love must be about (and this is the way it must sound).
I love this man. This has been on my ipod for months, but I haven't listened to it till now. Completely surprised to find one of my favorite songs :)
awwwh. i love this song in sweeney todd. great cover. <3
A fantastic version of a Sondheim classic
demais... e com o jamie cullum melhor ainda!
First heard it one day after watching Sweeney Todd. Great.
Sweeny Todd? Is there nothing this man can't cover? I think not.
